comment: Under the assumption ` -. x = y ` a specialized version of ~ 19.8a is provable from Tarski's FOL and ~ ax13v only. Note that this reverts the implication in ~ ax13lem2 , so in fact ` ( -. x = y -> ( E. x z = y <-> z = y ) ) ` holds. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 17-Apr-2021.)
